actions.text: Mr. Riggs rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted H. Res. 431 for consideration.
Mr. Gephardt moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 181 (Roll no. 81).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Requiring an investigation into the published reports of illegal hiring practices in the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House and Minority Leader to appoint an ad hoc committee under the jurisdiction of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to investigate the published reports of illegal hiring practices in the House and report within 90 days to the full House any violations of its rules. Authorizes such committee to appoint a special counsel to assist in this investigation.

titles.title: Requiring an investigation into the published reports of illegal hiring practices in the House of Representatives.
